article_title: A second potential COVID-19 vaccine, backed by Bill and Melinda Gates, is entering human testing
article_description: A new COVID 19 vaccine candidate is entering Phase 1 clinical human testing today  after the U S  Food and Drug Administration  FDA  accepted an application from Inovio Pharmaceuticals under the regulator s Investigational New Drug program  Inovio plans to in
